name: Scale AI
headline: Data-centric infrastructure to accelerate the development of AI
description: Scale accelerates the development of AI within organizations of any size to deliver critical business insights and operational efficiency. Its data-centric infrastructure platform leverages RLHF (Reinforced Learning with Human Feedback) to help organizations build the strongest AI models that supercharge their business, with customers across industries including Meta, Microsoft, U.S. Army, DoD’s Defense Innovation Unit, Open AI, General Motors, Toyota Research Institute, Brex, Instacart and Flexport.

## Generative AI Architecture
Whether you’re building your own models or applying foundation models to your business, data remains the biggest bottleneck to AI.
[Book a Demo→](http://scale.com/</demo>)
Fine-Tuning and RLHF
Adapt best-in-class foundation models to your business and your specific data to build sustainable, successful AI programs and data from your enterprise.
Foundation Models
Scale partners or integrates with all of the leading AI models, from open-source to closed-source, including OpenAI, Google, Meta, Cohere, and more.

## We have changed the game of AI Evaluations - hear it from Industry Leaders.
Scale’s SEAL Leaderboards are bringing trust to AI; learn from experts why expert-driven private evaluations are so important.
"We partnered with Scale AI to work with Enterprises to adopt Llama and train custom models with their own data. We are excited to collectively make Llama the industry standard and bring the benefits of AI to everyone."
#### Mark Zuckerberg
Founder and CEO, Meta
"Great to see Gemini 1.5 pro top the new Scale SEAL leaderboard for adversarial robustness! Congrats to the entire Gemini team…and the AI safety team for leading the charge on building in robustness to our models as a core capability. Thanks to the Scale AI team for doing the vital work to create these rigorous benchmarks, the field needs more great work on topics like this"
#### Demis Hassabis
CEO, Deepmind
"Nice, a serious contender to LMSYS in evaluating LLMs has entered the chat: SEAL Leaderboards. LLM evals are improving, but not so long ago their state was very bleak, with qualitative experience very often disagreeing with quantitative rankings. Good evals are very difficult to build…They have to be comprehensive, representative, of high quality, and measure gradient signal, and there are a lot of details to think through and get right before your qualitative and quantitative assessments line up. …Good evals are unintuitively difficult, highly work-intensive, but quite important, so I'm happy to see more organizations join the effort to do it well."
#### Andrej Karpathy
Founder, EurekaLabsAI
"Scale is doing an amazing job providing high-quality uncontaminated evals, now with code and instruction following!"
#### Noam Brown
Member of Technical Staff, OpenAI
"We’re going to need a lot more investment in high-quality evals and benchmarks to help us understand the actual comparative utility of the various models. This new set of private evals and leaderboards from Scale are great to see"
#### Nat Friedman
Entrepreneur and Investor, and Former CEO of GitHub

generated_description:
**Overview of Scale AI**

**Company Name:** Scale AI  
**Website:** [scale.com](http://scale.com)  
**Founded:** 2016 (Y Combinator Batch S16)  
**Location:** San Francisco, CA  
**Employee Count:** 500  
**Group Partner:** Jared Friedman  

**Mission:** To provide data-centric infrastructure that accelerates the development of AI for organizations of all sizes, delivering crucial business insights and enhancing operational efficiency.

### What They Do

Scale AI is a powerhouse in the AI infrastructure space. Their primary offering is a data-centric platform that boosts the performance of AI models using **Reinforcement Learning with Human Feedback (RLHF)**. This methodology empowers companies to construct robust AI systems tailored to their needs.

They cater to a diverse clientele including giants like Meta, Microsoft, OpenAI, General Motors, and the U.S. Army, indicating their broad appeal across various industries. 

### Key Products and Services

1. **Scale Data Engine:** A powerful tool for training AI models.
2. **Generative AI Solutions:** Supervised fine-tuning and RLHF for generative models.
3. **Government-Focused Services:** High-quality data and platforms for public sector use.
4. **Automotive Solutions:** Supporting levels of autonomy in vehicles.
5. **Scale Donovan:** An AI platform tailored for the government sector.
6. **Scale GenAI Platform:** A full-stack generative AI solution for enterprises.
7. **Evaluation Tools:** Comprehensive evaluation services for AI models and applications.

### Commitment to Quality

Scale AI's approach to quality centers around data curation and labeling, blending AI methodologies with human oversight to create impactful datasets. They've established the SEAL (Safety, Evaluations, and Alignment Lab) to drive research and improve AI assessment methodologies.

### Industry Recognition

Their innovative work hasn't gone unnoticed. Prominent figures like Mark Zuckerberg (Meta), Demis Hassabis (DeepMind), and Andrej Karpathy (EurekaLabs AI) have acknowledged Scale AI's contributions to enhancing AI model evaluations and robustness.

### Conclusion

Scale AI stands at the intersection of cutting-edge AI technology and practical enterprise applications. With a data-centric approach, they empower organizations to unlock the full potential of AI while maintaining a strong commitment to quality and safety in model evaluations. If you’re looking to harness AI for your business, Scale AI is a formidable partner to consider.
